channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-22518|2024-09-17T02:11:34.421Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: A bug in CmpUserMgr component can lead to only partially applied security policies. This can result in enabled, anonymous access to components part of the applied security policy.

item.title: CVE-2022-22514|2024-09-17T03:03:50.086Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker can gain access to a dereferenced pointer contained in a request. The accesses can subsequently lead to local overwriting of memory in the CmpTraceMgr, whereby the attacker can neither gain the values read internally nor control the values to be written. If invalid memory is accessed, this results in a crash.

item.title: CVE-2022-31802|2024-09-17T00:32:18.904Z -- codesys -- codesys%20gateway%20server%20v2
item.description: In CODESYS Gateway Server V2 for versions prior to V2.3.9.38 only a part of the the specified password is been compared to the real CODESYS Gateway password. An attacker may perform authentication by specifying a small password that matches the corresponding part of the longer real CODESYS Gateway password.

item.title: CVE-2022-31806|2024-09-17T03:27:59.221Z -- codesys -- codesys%20plcwinnt
item.description: In CODESYS V2 PLCWinNT and Runtime Toolkit 32 in versions prior to V2.4.7.57 password protection is not enabled by default and there is no information or prompt to enable password protection at login in case no password is set at the controller.

item.title: CVE-2021-34599|2024-09-17T02:32:29.181Z -- codesys -- codesys%20git
item.description: Affected versions of CODESYS Git in Versions prior to V1.1.0.0 lack certificate validation in HTTPS handshakes. CODESYS Git does not implement certificate validation by default, so it does not verify that the server provides a valid and trusted HTTPS certificate. Since the certificate of the server to which the connection is made is not properly verified, the server connection is vulnerable to a man-in-the-middle attack.

item.title: CVE-2022-32142|2024-09-17T01:00:49.177Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: Multiple CODESYS Products are prone to a out-of bounds read or write access. A low privileged remote attacker may craft a request with invalid offset, which can cause an out-of-bounds read or write access, resulting in denial-of-service condition or local memory overwrite, which can lead to a change of local files. User interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-22519|2024-09-17T03:22:45.345Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: A remote, unauthenticated attacker can send a specific crafted HTTP or HTTPS requests causing a buffer over-read resulting in a crash of the webserver of the CODESYS Control runtime system.

item.title: CVE-2021-34586|2024-09-17T03:53:13.043Z -- codesys -- codesys%20v2
item.description: In the CODESYS V2 web server prior to V1.1.9.22 crafted web server requests may cause a Null pointer dereference in the CODESYS web server and may result in a denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-22516|2024-09-17T01:05:35.627Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: The SysDrv3S driver in the CODESYS Control runtime system on Microsoft Windows allows any system user to read and write within restricted memory space.

item.title: CVE-2021-34595|2024-09-17T03:42:53.986Z -- codesys -- codesys%20v2
item.description: A crafted request with invalid offsets may cause an out-of-bounds read or write access in CODESYS V2 Runtime Toolkit 32 Bit full and PLCWinNT prior to versions V2.4.7.56, resulting in a denial-of-service condition or local memory overwrite.

item.title: CVE-2022-32138|2024-09-17T01:47:02.194Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: In multiple CODESYS products, a remote attacker may craft a request which may cause an unexpected sign extension, resulting in a denial-of-service condition or memory overwrite.

item.title: CVE-2024-6876|2024-09-10T16:16:48.085Z -- codesys -- oscat%20basic%20library
item.description: Out-of-Bounds read vulnerability in OSCAT Basic Library allows an local, unprivileged attacker to access limited internal data of the PLC which may lead to a crash of the affected service.

item.title: CVE-2023-49676|2024-08-02T22:01:25.611Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to crash the system due to use after free vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-49675|2024-08-02T22:01:25.850Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to execute arbitrary code or crash the system due to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-5000|2024-08-01T20:55:10.389Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use a malicious OPC UA client to send a crafted request to affected CODESYS products which can cause a DoS due to incorrect calculation of buffer size.

item.title: CVE-2023-5751|2024-06-04T17:28:31.539Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20win%20%28sl%29
item.description: A local attacker with low privileges can read and modify any users files and cause a DoS in the working directory of the affected products due to exposure of resource to wrong sphere.

item.title: CVE-2023-49675|2024-06-04T17:27:55.639Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to execute arbitrary code or crash the system due to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-49676|2024-05-06T11:09:34.442Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to crash the system due to use after free vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-5000|2024-06-06T14:44:44.216Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use a malicious OPC UA client to send a crafted request to affected CODESYS products which can cause a DoS due to incorrect calculation of buffer size.

item.title: CVE-2023-49676|2024-06-12T20:23:58.235Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to crash the system due to use after free vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-5751|2024-08-02T08:07:32.848Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20win%20%28sl%29
item.description: A local attacker with low privileges can read and modify any users files and cause a DoS in the working directory of the affected products due to exposure of resource to wrong sphere.

item.title: CVE-2024-6876|2024-09-10T15:08:16.212Z -- codesys -- oscat%20basic%20library
item.description: Out-of-Bounds read vulnerability in OSCAT Basic Library allows an local, unprivileged attacker to access limited internal data of the PLC which may lead to a crash of the affected service.

item.title: CVE-2024-6876|2024-09-12T06:02:04.354Z -- codesys -- oscat%20basic%20library
item.description: Out-of-Bounds read vulnerability in OSCAT Basic Library allows an local, unprivileged attacker to access limited internal data of the PLC which may lead to a crash of the affected service.
